mapper.insert: insert into delivery ( addr_name, receiver, member_phone, post_code, delivery_addr1, delivery_addr2, used_date ) values ( #{addr_name}, #{receiver}, #{member_phone}, #{post_code}, #{delivery_addr1}, #{delivery_addr2}, now() )
mapper.select: select d.delivery_id, d.addr_name, d.member_id , d.receiver, d.member_phone, d.post_code, d.delivery_addr1, d.delivery_addr2, used_date from delivery d, member m where d.member_id = #{member_id} and del_yn = 0 and d.member_id = m.member_id order by d.used_date desc
